bibl.note: Reproduit de: JRS 43 (1953) pp. 49-64. - Pp. 244-255: Egyptian land registers of the first half of the fourth century. "The bulk of the soil of Egypt was still in the early fourth century held by peasant proprietors."
Jones A.H.M., Census Records of the Later Roman Empire.
A.H.M. Jones, The Roman Economy. Studies in Ancient Economic and Administrative History (Oxford, 1974) pp. 228-256.
